name: SwarmUI Integration
author: Gemini
description: Integrates SwarmUI for image generation, using your current SwarmUI settings. Adds a button to the chat to generate an image based on the current context.

variables.name: swarmUrl
variables.label: SwarmUI URL
variables.description: The base URL for your SwarmUI instance.

variables.name: showButton
variables.label: Show Generation Button
variables.description: Show the image generation button next to the text input.

variables.name: prompt
variables.label: LLM Image Prompt
variables.default_value:
Based on the last user message, create a short, descriptive, visually rich Stable Diffusion prompt for an image. The prompt should be a single paragraph of comma-separated tags. Focus on the most recent action or description. Do not include character dialogue. Describe the character's appearance, their action, the environment, and the overall mood.

Here is the last message:
"{{prompt}}"
variables.description: The prompt sent to the LLM to generate the image prompt. Use {{prompt}} for the last user message and {{char}} for the character's name.

variables.name: appendPrompt
variables.label: Append to Existing Prompt
variables.description: If enabled, the LLM-generated prompt will be appended to the prompt currently in your SwarmUI settings. If disabled, it will replace it.

variables.name: numImages
variables.label: Number of Images
variables.description: How many images to generate in a single batch.
